short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Giphy for some cool gifs, stickers and memes for any netflix title

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin provides an easy way to access lots and lots of gifs out there for any Netflix title. Adds a icon on netflix title page to access any sitckers, gifs and memes associated with the title
